title: Pimate｜元宇宙｜pi network｜派星球
subtitle: Pimate, the entrance to the future pi friend universe
description:
【三剑客社区】PiNetwork全球最有影响力的社区之一，PiNetwork创始以来唯一纯粹布道派的中文社区，三剑客社区目前包含一千多社群，31个自媒体账号，旗下IP<游龙说pi>等衍生品超过上亿的点击率，两年间公益服务中文区几百万派友，成为PiNetwork中文区的旗帜标杆！
派球星APP是未来派友生态元宇宙的入口，公司坐落于中国海南，是一家集区块链技术相关软件服务和开发；企业管理，供应链管理服务；市场营销策划；休闲农业和乡村旅游资源的开发经营为一体的创新型区块链科技企业。
公司自主开发的派星球APP-围绕着Pi的生态向社会提供服务，并且取得了国家承认的软著证书,即将上架国内的安卓，苹果和谷歌商店！
PiNetwork is one of the most influential communities in the world, the only pure evangelical Chinese community since the inception of the PiNet, the three musketers community currently contains more than 1000 communities, We have 31 media accounts, its IP < Youlong said pi > and other derivatives more than 100 million hits, two years of public service in the Chinese area of millions of friends to send, become the banner of PiNetwork in Chinese district benchmark!
PaiXing APP is the entrance of future PaiYu ecological meta-universe, the company is located in Hainan, China, is a collection of blockchain technology-related software services and development; Enterprise management, supply chain management services; Marketing planning; Leisure agriculture and rural tourism resources development and management as one of the innovative block chain technology enterprises.
The company's self-developed Pi Planet APP - around the ecological Pi to provide services to the community, and has achieved the national recognition of the soft certification, will be on the domestic Android, Apple and Google stores!
author: herowall8848
